title: D1+ eLysium esports open tryouts all roles.
body:
Hello. I am the new head coach for www.elysiumesports.net and we are currently looking for high elo players to participate in numerous online and offline tournaments. I'd like to declare an open tryout for all roles.

A bit of info about me aswell. Im a master tier EU player with experience in coaching Challenger NA teams and EU teams. I have been coaching for like over a year now kinda and I expect to have great results and a great time in OCE.

Requirements: Diamond 1 on the soloq ladder. Age 16+ Voice coms.

Send me a email @ raxxxshorse78@gmail.com and introduce yourself. Thank you and have a wonderful day.

PS:If you are already a team looking for a org send me an email aswell.


Regards, Garrett.

replies.body: hey mate would love to try out, recently being banned on my main. which is this account. i am a mean mid laner and also adc. you can look me up im ranked 74 best jinx in oce. if you want to contact me add MCfishbones i can talk on chat still there but had to make a new account which ive only just got into silver from b5{{champion:222}} . cheers mate.
